title: Client Freezing
body: With a few seconds remaining on my timer, I attempted to select my champion in the new champ select, but the client did not register the selection. With 1 second remaining, I was finally able to select my champion and click lock in, but I was removed from the game as if I had not locked. Upon returning to the lobby, many buttons simply stopped working all together, including queue up and the 'x' to close the client, though I could still view my profile. As a result I had to go into task manager to close the client, and I am now stuck with a 30 minute  wait timer as punishment for the horrible crimes I have committed against the league community (I dodged ONCE previously because I forgot to lock my champion). Please fix your shit, or don't make people wait 30 minutes for dodging twice, especially when everything about the new champ select (stability, manual lock in requirement) is conducive to players UNINTENTIONALLY dodging.

replies.body:
Hey MildToroise,

If you're having client issues, I'd suggest [starting League as an admin and running a repair.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4) Just try restarting your client before you get into that, though, and test your game in custom matches if possible.

Let me know if that helps.

-DTN
